column5: Please Help, got a picture of my wifes 50 in. ski and would like to post it, but the picture on my computer gets rotated in my album and for the heck of me, I can't get it right side up, ANY HELP WOULD BE APPRECIATED.. Thank you
I have my pics located in pictures and when I open it and want to see 1 pic I double click it and then at the top there is an arrow to rotate to the right. It rotates a quarter turn each click
This happens if the file size is too large. jpeg pics max size for posting is 488kb. If You don't reduce the file size I have had my pictures rotate sideways.
